mapper.insert:
select noticeComment_seq.nextval from dual
insert into noticeComment (notice_Comment_No,notice_Comment_Content,notice_Comment_Date,member_No,notice_No) values(#{noticeCommentNo},#{noticeCommentContent},sysdate,#{memberNo},#{noticeNo})
mapper.update: update notice_Comment set notice_Comment_Content=#{noticeCommentContent} where noticeCommentNo=#{noticeCommentNo} and noticeNo=#{noticeNo}
mapper.delete: delete from notice_Comment where notice_Comment_No=#{noticeCommentNo} and notice_No=#{noticeNo}
